Html:
Is there any reason why there is no option "One" in the QuietZoneModules enum?
I would really like to have the quiet zone the same size of each module.

ISO default is 4.

Zero for people that wish to draw under area where it has same background as white module.

Two works for most of case, might be too small for larger code.

No particular reason but to cover 90% of usage. I would prefer 4 in most of case, and if its zero, draw the code myself. Since if I put code at a proper background, then I don't have to draw white module at all.
